nodes.id: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

zh-cn: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司
en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) Limited

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行在海外的业务旗舰，主要业务是提供银行、财务及其他相关服务。其前身为友联银行。
description.en: The overseas business flagship of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, mainly providing banking, financial, and other related services. Its predecessor was Union Bank of Hong Kong.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的大型国有商业银行，是中国工商银行（亚洲）的母公司。
description.en: A large state-owned commercial bank in China, the parent company of ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司的前身，于1964年成立。
description.en: The predecessor of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) Limited, established in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司主席。
description.en: Chairman of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) Limited.

description.zh-cn: 比利时金融集团，曾持有中国工商银行（亚洲）的股份。
description.en: A Belgian financial group that formerly held shares in ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 曾为富通集团旗下的香港银行，后被工银亚洲收购。
description.en: A Hong Kong bank formerly under the Fortis Group, later acquired by ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 华比富通银行被工银亚洲收购后改回的原名，后并入工银亚洲。
description.en: The original name to which Fortis Bank Asia HK reverted after being acquired by ICBC (Asia), before being merged into ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 负责接手工银亚洲寿险业务的公司之一。
description.en: One of the companies that took over the life insurance business of ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 负责接手工银亚洲寿险业务的公司之一。
description.en: One of the companies that took over the life insurance business of ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 工银亚洲从该行处收购了部分华商银行股份。
description.en: ICBC (Asia) acquired part of the shares of Hua Shang Bank from this bank.

description.zh-cn: 在深圳注册的银行，现为工银亚洲的全资子公司。
description.en: A bank registered in Shenzhen, now a wholly-owned subsidiary of ICBC (Asia).

description.zh-cn: 中国的特别行政区，国际金融中心。
description.en: A special administrative region of China and an international financial center.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，富通集团总部所在地。
description.en: A European country, home to the Fortis Group headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中国广东省的副省级市，华商银行的注册地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Guangdong Province, China, and the place of registration for Hua Shang Bank.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司是中国工商银行在海外的业务旗舰，中国工商银行持有其100%股份。
description.en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) Limited is the overseas business flagship of ICBC, which holds 100% of its shares.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 友联银行有限公司于2000年8月21日更名为中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司，成为中国工商银行集团成员。
description.en: Union Bank of Hong Kong Limited was renamed Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) Limited on August 21, 2000, becoming a member of the ICBC Group.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 姜建清担任中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司主席。
description.en: Jiang Jianqing serves as the Chairman of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) Limited.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 富通集团曾持有工银亚洲大约一成股份，后由中国工商银行收购。
description.en: Fortis Group once held about a 10% stake in ICBC (Asia), which was later acquired by the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 于2003年12月31日，工银亚洲收购了华比富通银行。
description.en: On December 31, 2003, ICBC (Asia) acquired Fortis Bank Asia HK.

description.zh-cn: 2004年5月1日，华比富通银行易名为华比银行。
description.en: On May 1, 2004, Fortis Bank Asia HK was renamed Belgian Bank.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 于2005年10月10日，华比银行并入工银亚洲，其独立法人地位终止。
description.en: On October 10, 2005, Belgian Bank was merged into ICBC (Asia), and its independent legal status was terminated.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2005年，工银亚洲向中国工商银行及中信嘉华银行收购了在深圳注册的华商银行。
description.en: In 2005, ICBC (Asia) acquired Hua Shang Bank, registered in Shenzhen, from the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China and CITIC Ka Wah Bank.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 收购完成后，华商银行成为工银亚洲的全资子公司。
description.en: After the acquisition, Hua Shang Bank became a wholly-owned subsidiary of ICBC (Asia).

relationships.target: 中国工商银行（亚洲）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行于2010年对工银亚洲进行私有化，并于同年12月21日完成退市。
description.en: The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China privatized ICBC (Asia) in 2010, and it was delisted on December 21 of the same year.
